Feature Editor

Smart Editor for BDD Gherkin Cucumber Feature Files




Find out more

Packed with convenient features to speed up your work

Here are just some of them

Lookup Steps

As you start typing your step name, Feature Editor will search for existing steps

Edit Step Data

Edit step data quickly and safely

Search for Features

Search for all your features in the project

Explore Tags, Packages and Users

Browse features by tag, package or user

Get It Here!

Download Release 0.1.1

Note this is preliminary and not production ready release, it is meant for research and testing!



Start the application:

"java -jar FeatureEditor-0.1.1.jar server"
